show_name: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru: Washio Sumi no Shou
other_title: Yuki Yuna is a Hero: The Washio Sumi Chapter
結城友奈は勇者である -鷲尾須美の章-
opening_theme: "Egao no Kimi e (エガオノキミへ)" by Suzuko Mimori
ending_theme: #1: "Tomodachi (ともだち)" by Sumi Washio (Suzuko Mimori), Sonoko Nogi (Kana Hanazawa), Gin Minowa (Yumiri Hanamori) (eps 2, 3, 5)
#2: "Tamashii (たましい)" by Gin Minowa (Yumiri Hanamori) (ep 4)
#3: "Yakusoku (やくそく)" by  Sumi Washio (Suzuko Mimori), Sonoko Nogi (Kana Hanazawa) (ep 6)
